summary: Mine map markers are now labeled with their appropriate ore.
descriptionHtml:
I thought this had already existed at one point on the nexus, but after a quick search turned up no results, I decided to (re-?) create it myself.

This mod simply adds the the ore type to the Skyrim map markers and places new map markers at mine locations where there weren\'t before.
Now, mine titles will appear following this example:   Bilegulch Mine (Orichalcum)

For those who prefer it, the alternate version (v2alt) displays mine names thusly: Bilegulch Orichalcum Mine.


Enjoy :)

***********************************************************************
What you will get
***********************************************************************

-Ore labels added to the following locations:
Fort Fellhammer (Iron)
Soljund\'s Sinkhole (Moonstone)
Bilegulch Mine (Orichalcum)
Embershard Mine (Iron)
Gloombound Mine (Ebony)
Kolskeggr Mine (Gold)
Left Hand Mine (Iron)
Lost Prospect Mine (Gold)
Northwind Mine (Iron)
Whilstling Mine (Iron)



-Map markers and ore labels added for the following mines:
Dushnikh Mine (Orichalcum)
Fenn\'s Gulch Mine (Silver)
Goldenrock Mine (Corundum)
Ironbreaker Mine *(no label needed)
Knifepoint Mine (Iron)
Mor Khazgur Mine (Orichalcum)
Quicksilver Mine *(no label needed)
Redbelly Mine (Ebony)
Rockwallow Mine (Iron)
Sanaurach Mine (Silver)
Steamscorch Mine (Malachite)

-Note, you will have to discover these added locations before they will show up, which may mean trekking back to some areas you have already been (ie: if you have already discovered Kynesgrove before adding this mod, you will have to return there and discover Steamscorch Mine before it will show up on your map.)
author: ShiverTwitch
